entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Flurries inland and over higher terrain early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow or rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning near noon then changing to rain late in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm except 10 cm inland. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then increasing to 60 gusting to 80 late in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain at times heavy. Temperature rising to 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 50 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 120 over exposed areas late in the evening and after midnight. Wind becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Temperature rising to 7 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023
